text: The Mummy Returns is a 2001 action and platform video game released for the PlayStation 2, and Game Boy Color. The game was released in the North America & PAL regions and is based on the popular Universal Pictures film The Mummy Returns. == Other websites == * GameFAQs - The Mummy Returns (PS2) * GameFAQs - The Mummy Returns (GBC) Category:2001 video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Game Boy Color games Category:Action video games Category:Platform games
title: The Mummy Returns (video game)
